content.html: A few people suggested that having each API team create and support mocks for their APIs would be preferable. While I agree, that's not typically practical. Why? Because the API teams don't benefit from doing so. As a consumer, I benefit, so I'm motivated to create the mocks.
content.value:
A few people suggested that having each API team create and support mocks for their APIs would be preferable. 

While I agree, that's not typically practical. Why? Because the API teams don't benefit from doing so. 

As a consumer, I benefit, so I'm motivated to create the mocks.
